nodes.text: DarkStryder's Fortress was a massive citadel located on the Northern Continent of the planet Kathol. Constructed of organic technology, the tower was mainly comprised of a translucent material that moved rhythmically, giving the impression of breathing.

During DarkStryder's alliance with Moff Kentor Sarne, Imperial technology was used to reinforce the structure, including durasteel armor. Below the fortress was the Lifewell and the Shrine of the Sleeper,
